name: Hunchback's Dungeon
description:
Defend yourself from hordes of undead skeletons in Hunchback's Dungeon, an action-roguelite arena shooter! You play as a deformed, magic-wielding human. Unlock new characters and difficulties, collect unique items, equip powerful spells, and survive until the end.

FEATURES


  • Become an ultimate spell caster, wielding up to 4 unique and powerful spells at the same time. The list of spells available in the game is growing;


  • Really fast runs (20-30 minutes);


  • Unlock new characters, difficulties and items;


  • Tons of items to power yourself up with;
